document.id: City of American Canyon, Cal., Ord. No. 2010-11
document.heading: AN ORDINANCE OF THE CITY OF AMERICAN CANYON AMENDING CHAPTER 5.12 ENTITLED "CARDROOMS" BY ADDING SECTIONS 5.12.230 THROUGH 5.12.380 OF THE AMERICAN CANYON MUNICIPAL CODE ESTABLISHING A NEW CARDROOM ADMISSION TAX OF $2.00 PER PATRON
